title: Compute1 Cloud Maintenance
content:
In order to further improve our product quality and guarantee the stability of our services, we will perform maintenance on our cloud servers.

The maintenance work will take place on Monday, 08th of August 2022 at 10:00 (CEST) and will end at approximately 10:30 (CEST), although we will try to keep the interruption as minimal as possible.

During this time, cloud servers may be temporarily unavailable and will be shutdown via APCI (Software Shutdown).

Thank you for your understanding.

2022-08-08T08:00:00.000Z
Update

We are beginning with the maintenance now. Instances might be unavailable during this time.
